ch.artecat.grengine

Class Grengine.Grape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.artecat.grengine.Grengine.Grape
  • Enclosing class:
    Grengine

    public static class Grengine.Grape
extends Object
    Convenience class for easily getting a Grengine that works with Grape, eliminating also a Groovy issue related to Grape (GROOVY-7407).

    Call activate() once before using the newGrengine() methods to create a Grengine instance that works with Grape.

    See the user manual at "Grengine and Grape" and the DefaultGroovyCompiler class for more information.

    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Alain Stalder, Made in Switzerland.

        activate Grape.

        See DefaultGroovyCompiler.enableGrapeSupport() and the user manual for more information.

        Since:
        1.2

      • activate

        public static void activate(Object lock)
        activate Grape.

        See DefaultGroovyCompiler.enableGrapeSupport(Object) and the user manual for more information.

        Parameters:
        lock - lock to use
        Since:
        1.2

      • deactivate

        public static void deactivate()
        deactivate Grape.

        See DefaultGroovyCompiler.disableGrapeSupport() and the user manual for more information.

        Since:
        1.2

      • newGrengine

        public static Grengine newGrengine()
        equivalent to Grengine.Grengine(), with the following differences.

        Parent class loader is a GroovyClassLoader with the context class loader of the current thread as its parent. Compiler configuration is the default compiler configuration, with added Grape support.

        Returns:
        new instance
        Since:
        1.2

      • newGrengine

        public static Grengine newGrengine(org.codehaus.groovy.control.CompilerConfiguration config)
        equivalent to Grengine.Grengine(CompilerConfiguration), with the following differences.

        Parent class loader is a GroovyClassLoader with the context class loader of the current thread as its parent.

        Parameters:
        config - compiler configuration to use for compiling all sources, Grape support is added to it
        Returns:
        new instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the compiler configuration is null
        Since:
        1.2

      • newGrengine

        public static Grengine newGrengine(groovy.lang.GroovyClassLoader parent)
        equivalent to Grengine.Grengine(ClassLoader), with the following differences.

        Compiler configuration is the default compiler configuration, with added Grape support.

        Parameters:
        parent - parent class loader for the engine
        Returns:
        new instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the parent class loader is null
        Since:
        1.2

        public static Grengine newGrengine(Collection<URL> urls)
        equivalent to Grengine.Grengine(Collection), with the following differences.

        Parent class loader is a GroovyClassLoader with the context class loader of the current thread as its parent. Compiler configuration is the default compiler configuration, with added Grape support.

        Parameters:
        urls - collection of URL-based scripts
        Returns:
        new instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the URL collection is null

        1.2
